mapper.sql: t.ELEMENT_ID, t.P_ID, t.TENANT_ID, t.PROVINCE_ID, t.CITY_ID, t.ELEMENT_VALUE1, t.ELEMENT_VALUE2, t.RESERVE_1, t.RESERVE_2, t.RESERVE_3, t.RESERVE_4, t.RESERVE_5,t1.PARAMS_TYPE_ID,t2.PARAMS_NAME, t1.ELEMENT_CODE, t1.ELEMENT_NAME, t1.ELEMENT_TYPE, t1.IS_VALIDATE, t1.IS_REGION, t1.IS_NEED
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_qm_strategy_element_rel t JOIN t_qm_strategy_element t1 ON t.ELEMENT_ID = t1.ELEMENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN t_qm_static_params t2 ON t1.PARAMS_TYPE_ID = t2.PARAMS_CODE
order by t.${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_qm_strategy_element_rel
ELEMENT_ID,
P_ID,
TENANT_ID,
PROVINCE_ID,
CITY_ID,
ELEMENT_VALUE1,
ELEMENT_VALUE2,
RESERVE_1,
RESERVE_2,
RESERVE_3,
RESERVE_4,
RESERVE_5,

#{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_qm_strategy_element_rel
ELEMENT_ID = #{record.elementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_ID = #{record.pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE_ID = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_ID = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_VALUE1 = #{record.elementValue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_VALUE2 = #{record.elementValue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_1 = #{record.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_2 = #{record.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_3 = #{record.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_4 = #{record.reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_5 = #{record.reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_qm_strategy_element_rel set ELEMENT_ID = #{record.elementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_ID = #{record.pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_ID = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_VALUE1 = #{record.elementValue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_VALUE2 = #{record.elementValue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_1 = #{record.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_2 = #{record.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_3 = #{record.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_4 = #{record.reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_5 = #{record.reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_qm_strategy_element_rel
TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_VALUE1 = #{elementValue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_VALUE2 = #{elementValue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ELEMENT_ID = #{elementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and P_ID = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
